translation.app-disclaimer: These are not real assets. The prices are fake. I am not a certified financial professional. But if you want to buy some fake stocks, I know a guy! (It's me, I'll accept your money.)
translation.portfolio-link-text: For more fun - enter the RajVerse.

translation.app-disclaimer: Esos no son acciones reales, son falsos! No soy un profesional financiero certificado. Pero, si quieres comprar algunos acciones falsos, quizas conozco a un hombre! (Soy yo, dame tu dinero.)
translation.portfolio-link-text: Quiere divirterse? Para mas, por favor haz click al RajVerse!
